member.name: T:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.ILuceneAnalyzer
member.summary: Represents an instance that is available in the system.

summary.para: Provides a way to execute a search request in Lucene based on a JSON object.
OC implementation serializes that JSON object to a Lucene Query based on its implementations.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.ILuceneSearchQueryService.ExecuteQueryAsync(Lucene.Net.Search.Query,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Provides a way to execute a search request in Lucene based on a Lucene Query.

member.name: T:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.Indexing.Index
member.summary: Represents the settings of a Lucene index.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.Indexing.Index.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the technical name of the index.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.Indexing.Index.DefaultAnalyzer
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the default analyzer.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.Indexing.Index.DefaultSearchFields
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of default search fields.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.Indexing.Index.Mappings
member.summary: Gets the list of types to index indexed by name.

member.name: T:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.Indexing.Mapping
member.summary: Represents the information of a content type in a Lucene index.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.Indexing.Mapping.Properties
member.summary: Gets the list properties to index indexed by name.

member.name: T:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.Indexing.Property
member.summary: Represents the Lucene index settings of a property.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.Indexing.Property.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the data type in the Lucene index.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.Indexing.Property.Index
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the field should be searchable or not. Default is true.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.Indexing.Property.Store
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the field value should be stored and retrievable. Default is false.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.Indexing.Property.IncludeInAll
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the field value should included in the _all field. Default is false.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.Indexing.Property.ScalingFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets the scaling factor of the field. Values will be multiplied by this factor at index time and rounded to the closest value.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.Indexing.Property.Analyzer
member.summary: Gets or sets the analyzer to be used at both index-time and search-time unless overridden by the .

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.Indexing.Property.SearchAnalyzer
member.summary: Gets or sets the analyzer to be used at search-time.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.Indexing.Property.Fields
member.summary: Gets the list of supplemental values to be indexed.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.Indexing.Property.Boost
member.summary: Gets or sets the query time boosting.
